channel.title: An Error with runserver.bat
channel.description:
hello guys, i got an weird error when i try to run my server. the error is : [code]Exception in trhead ''main'' java.lang.noclassdeffounderror: server caused by: java.lang.classnotfoundexception: server at java.neturlclassloader$1.run<unkown source> at java.sercurity.accescontroller.doprivileged<native method> at java.net.neturlclassloader.Findclass<unkown source> at java.lang.classloader.loadclass<unkown source> at sun.misc.launcher$appclassloader.loadclass<unkown source> at java.lang.classloader.loadclass<unknown class> at java.lang.classloader.loadclassInteral<unkown source> could not find the main class: server. Progam will exit. [/code]
this is in the Runserver.bat : [code]@echo off
java -Xmx800M server
pause
[/code]
I Try to run a Dodian V7
and i got as java version: jre1.5.0_11

item.title: An Error with runserver.bat
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

Try:

@echo off java -classpath . server pause

Read full topic

item.title: An Error with runserver.bat
item.dc:creator: @rickoez rickoez
item.description:
@rickoez wrote:

hello guys,
i got an weird error when i try to run my server.
the error is :

Exception in trhead ''main'' java.lang.noclassdeffounderror: server caused by: java.lang.classnotfoundexception: server at java.neturlclassloader$1.run<unkown source> at java.sercurity.accescontroller.doprivileged<native method> at java.net.neturlclassloader.Findclass<unkown source> at java.lang.classloader.loadclass<unkown source> at sun.misc.launcher$appclassloader.loadclass<unkown source> at java.lang.classloader.loadclass<unknown class> at java.lang.classloader.loadclassInteral<unkown source> could not find the main class: server. Progam will exit.

this is in the Runserver.bat :

[code]@echo off

java -Xmx800M server

pause

[/code]

I Try to run a Dodian V7

and i got as java version: jre1.5.0_11

Read full topic
